title: Kipplo
description:
Kipplo is a contact data provider with access to 500+ million decision-makers worldwide, helping you connect with the right prospects. 

You can export unlimited contacts with no credits required. The platform also includes the Kipplo Chrome extension for LinkedIn, allowing you to find verified emails and phone numbers with one click. 

Kipplo supports multiple users, secure API key management, and seamless integrations. Transform your work with trusted, privacy-compliant contact data.
